tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE solo_travelers (
    traveler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_name VARCHAR(255),
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    trip_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE solo_travelers (
    id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    interests VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE trip_plans (
    id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    destination VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    group_size INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (traveler_id) REFERENCES solo_travelers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE solo_travelers (
    traveler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
    trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_name TEXT,
    destination TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE connections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_id1 INT,
    traveler_id2 INT,
    connection_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (traveler_id1) REFERENCES solo_travelers(traveler_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (traveler_id2) REFERENCES solo_travelers(traveler_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trips ( 
    trip_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    destination VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    start_date DATE, 
    end_date DATE, 
    organizer_id INT NOT NULL REFERENCES solo_travelers(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE messages ( 
    message_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    sender_id INT REFERENCES solo_travelers(id), 
    receiver_id INT REFERENCES solo_travelers(id), 
    message_text TEXT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);
